sentences.english: This gorge begins at the Daning River in Sichuan Province and runs 44 km.
sentences.chinese: 這個峽開始於四川大寧河，全長44公里。

sentences.english: Situated on the banks of the Danning river, a tributary north of the Yangtze, lies the ancient village of Dachang.
sentences.chinese: 大昌古鎮座落於長江北部支流大寧河的沿岸。

sentences.english: We went to plant trees in Daning Greenland.
sentences.chinese: 我們去了大寧綠地的樹木植物。

sentences.english: I am a student of grade two in Daning International Elementary School.
sentences.chinese: 我是大寧國際小學二年級的學生。
